      voidsetGihubCredentials(String username!, String password!, Boolean saveCredentials!)
      voidsetUpdateAvailableFlag(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!, Tag tag!, RemoteBBjPlugin remotePlugin!)

      Checks if the given InstalledBBPlugin's version(=Tag) can be updated or not.

      If the given Tag is the master tag, the timestamp of the last change and the timestamp of the installation will be compared. For all other tags, the tag name will be compared.

        public Boolean hasDependenciesToBBjPlugins(Tag tag!)

        Returns true if the plugin with the given name and the given tag name has dependencies to other plugins, false otherwise.

        Parameters:
        pluginName! The name of the plugin.
        tagName! The name of the plugin's tag.
        Returns:
        true if the plugin has dependencies to BBj Plugins, false otherwise.

        public void setGihubCredentials(String username!, String password!, Boolean saveCredentials!)

      • setUpdateAvailableFlag

        public void setUpdateAvailableFlag(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!, Tag tag!, RemoteBBjPlugin remotePlugin!)

        Checks if the given InstalledBBPlugin's version(=Tag) can be updated or not.

        If the given Tag is the master tag, the timestamp of the last change and the timestamp of the installation will be compared. For all other tags, the tag name will be compared.
